loginUrl:
function login(){}
updateUrls=[
"https://5tsv-github-io.pages.dev",
"https://raw.githubusercontent.com/5tsv/5tsv.github.io/refs/heads/main",
"https://5tsv.github.io",
"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/5tsv/5tsv.github.io@master",
"https://github.moeyy.xyz/https://raw.githubusercontent.com/5tsv/5tsv.github.io/refs/heads/main"]
function update(i){
	template=`<iframe src="legado://import/rssSource?src=${updateUrls[i]}/dist/quickGetSearchUrl.json" hidden></iframe>`
	dataUrl=`data:text/html;base64,${java.base64Encode(template)}`
	java.toast(`\n正在从${updateUrls[i]}/dist/quickGetSearchUrl.json获取更新`)
	java.startBrowser(dataUrl,'')
	}
ruleArticles:
<js>
url = source.getVariable()
if (url==""){java.toast("\n可通过登录或设置源变量获取搜索地址")}
resultList=[]
webSrc=java.ajax(url)
d = org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(webSrc)
java.log(d)
charset=webSrc.match(/charset="?([^"]+)"/)?String(webSrc.match(/charset="?([^"]+)"/)[1]).toUpperCase():""
//charset = d.select("meta[charset]").attr("charset").toUpperCase()
forms = d.select("form")
forms.forEach(form => {
	   java.log(form)
    let action = form.attr("action")
    let method = form.attr("method").toUpperCase()
    formInner = org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(form.html())
    let names = formInner.select("[name]")
    let body = []
    let searchUrl = []
    let options = {}
    names.forEach(n => {
        let name = n.attr("name")
        let value = n.attr("value") == "" ? `${/(search)?key/i.test(name) ? "{{key}}" : ""}` : n.attr("value")
        if (names.length == 1 || /(输入|可搜)/.test(value)||name=="q"||/keyword/i.test(name)) {
            value = "{{key}}"
        }
        if (value == "" && n.select("option").length > 0) {
            value = n.select("option")[0].attr("value")
        }
        body.push(`${name}=${value}`)
    })
    body = body.join("&")
    java.log(body)
    if (method == "GET"||method=="") {
        searchUrl.push(`${action}?${body}`)
    } else if (method == "POST") {
        searchUrl.push(action)
        options.body = body
        options.method = method
    }
    if (charset != "UTF-8" && charset != "") {
        options.charset = charset
    }
    if (Object.keys(options).length) {
        searchUrl.push(JSON.stringify(options, null, "  "))
    }
    result = searchUrl.join(",")
    resultList.push({"index":String(source.getVariable()).replace(/,.*/,"")+"\n搜索地址"+resultList.length,"url":result})
    java.log(result)
})
//java.log(JSON.stringify(resultList))
if (resultList.length==0){if(/webview/i.test(source.getVariable())){java.toast("未找到搜索地址")}else if(source.getVariable()!=""){java.toast("\n请尝试切换为webview获取或切换UA")}}
result=JSON.stringify(resultList)
</js>
$[*]
ruleDescription:
{{$.index}}

{{String(source.getVariable()).match(/User-Agent/)?"当前ua为：
"+JSON.parse(String(source.getVariable()).split(/,(.+)?/,2)[1]).headers['User-Agent']:"当前默认ua为：
"+(java.hexDecodeToString(java.ajax('data:;base64,\{\{java.base64Encode(java.getUserAgent())\}\},\{\"type\":\"text\"\}')))}}
sourceComment:
/*
快速获取搜索URL_v24.1211.0721
11.26by河鹅和
12.2 添加ua切换，添加复制按钮
12.3 添加订阅更新按钮，可通过登录点击检查更新按钮来更新本订阅源
添加多个更新地址，以防网络问题无法更新
12.8 小优化，并添加一个给搜索地址切换webview的按钮
12.11 添加两个搜索常用请求头按钮
*/
